Text:
Is this really a screener, and not some damn camera-capture, like too many "screeners" are?
Also, if this is a screener, was the source VHS or DVD, and is it widescreen or not?

Kaotik, this is a VHS screener and fullscreen.
Picture is a little blurry and pixelated but better than camera quality for sure. There is a watermark on the bottom left corner that has been blurred out and is noticable at times. Audio is bad at all.

For screenshots and nfo: http://www.hypoh.com/movies/screener-vhs/schoolforscoundrelsscreenerxvid-bmb
